players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and found out Diana is mafia. We need to act fast."
Diana: "I will remain silent and observe the situation. The detective has already figured out my role, so I need to be cautious."
Charlie: "I will continue to observe and gather more information. The detective has already identified the mafia, but we need to be careful as there might still be other threats."
You: "I will keep my silence and observe the situation closely. The detective has already identified Diana as mafia, so I need to be cautious and gather more information on Bob's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
